title: The life expectancy in the United States is deteriorating thanks to Obama's care program.
subtitle: Some outlets have involved a link between an annual actuarial study that reduces the forecast of future increases to life expectancy in the United States and the implementation of the Affordable Care Act, but this logic is at best a false one.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Life expectancy in the United States is now lower due to the Obama Care Program.
